name: fvnobday
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, csur), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cbday, c0)), emptycls))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, csur), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cbday, c0)), emptycls), wn(wcel(cfv(cbday, c0), cdm(c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csur), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cbday, c0)), emptycls))

-| wi(wn(wcel(cfv(cbday, c0), cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cbday, c0)), emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ No →(c0 `(bday ` c0))= ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ No → ¬(bday ` c0)∈ dom(c0))
⊣ (¬(bday ` c0)∈ dom(c0)→(c0 `(bday ` c0))= ∅)
